price: 8. In welke vorm Hij ook wilde, heeft Hij jullie samengesteld.
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
